name: Shrek Sugar Fever
description:
In the land of Far Far Away, a sweet spell has candified the kingdom, including Shrek’s swamp! Help Shrek rescue his sugar-crazed friends from their candy obsession in this block puzzle saga!

Put an end to the sugar rush and unsweeten Shrek’s swamp by matching scrumptious candy tiles as you travel through enchanted levels throughout hours of immersive block bursting fun!

Rescue your favorite characters like Donkey, Gingy, Pinocchio, and the Three Little Pigs, and more with original power ups to make the best match!

Mirror, mirror on the wall, is this not the most magical puzzle game of them all?

FEATURES:

IT AIN’T OGRE TILL IT’S OGRE…
Undo the sugar spell in more than 175 candy filled levels and 7 delectable map environments in the land of Far Far Away!

RESCUE YOUR FAVORITE HEROES
Match together colorful tiles in addictive gameplay! Play companion levels to save Shrek’s friends from their sugar fever including Donkey, Gingy, Pinocchio, and the Three Little Pigs!

CONNECT WITH FACEBOOK
Login with Facebook: Now you can invite your friends to see their progress. Save your progress, play with a multi-device login on Facebook, and send and receive lives. You can also post on your Facebook wall when you beat a level or surpass a friend.

UNLOCK UNIQUE POWER UPS
Discover why flatulence is a good thing and other gassy boosts! Donkey has double the candies to crush!

DEFEAT VILLAINS ACROSS THE KINGDOM
Vanquish Lord Farquaad in boss mode with special POWER UPS that will ensure you don’t come up short!

PLEASE NOTE: Shrek Sugar Fever is a puzzle game that is free to play. However, you will have the option to buy some in-game items for real money. Sweet deal! If you prefer to not use this feature, disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
